name: RPG Maker VX RGSS Encrypted Archive

description: RGSS2A files are created by selecting File â†’ Compress Game Data... and checking the "Create Encrypted Archive" box.
NOTE: RGSS2A and .RGSSAD files are used by RPG Maker VX, whereas RPG Maker VX Ace uses the .RGSS3A file extension.
